dict.string: You must connect to a Wi-Fi network to set up Apple TV.
You must connect to a Wi-Fi network using DHCP to set up Apple TV.

You can help Apple improve its products and user support by having your Apple TV automatically send Apple information from time to time about how it's working and how you use it.
To learn more about Apple's Privacy Policy, see http://www.apple.com/privacy/.
Would you like Apple TV to remember the password for %@ to rent or purchase items from the iTunes Store?
Enter your Apple ID password to sign into your iTunes Store account on Apple TV.
